diabetes-checkup.name: Diabetes Checkup
diabetes-checkup.description: Helps monitor blood sugar levels and assess diabetes control.
diabetes-checkup.why: This test is essential for diagnosing diabetes, monitoring blood glucose control, and preventing long-term complications.

thyroid-profile.name: Thyroid Profile
thyroid-profile.description: Complete thyroid evaluation to assess hormonal balance.
thyroid-profile.why: This test helps diagnose thyroid disorders such as hypothyroidism and hyperthyroidism.

tsh.name: TSH (Thyroid Stimulating Hormone)
tsh.description: Measures thyroid-stimulating hormone to evaluate thyroid function.
tsh.why: TSH testing is the primary screening test for thyroid disorders.

urine-re.name: Urine Routine Examination
urine-re.description: Evaluates urine for infections, kidney issues, and metabolic conditions.
urine-re.why: This test helps detect urinary tract infections, kidney disease, and diabetes-related complications.
